sentences.english: The normal auricles in different ages groups with 2017 cases were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 测量2017名不同年龄正常耳郭的发育。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of surgical excision with compression buttoning on pseudo-cysts of the auricle.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估耳郭假性囊肿手术治疗的临床价值。

sentences.english: We also observed the types of external ear and lobe in 213 cases.
sentences.chinese: 对213例耳郭和耳垂的类型进行了观察。

sentences.english: Objective Try to find an effective method creating auriculocephalic angle in auricle reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨耳郭再造术中颅耳角成形的一种有效方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical management of total auricular reconstruction utilizing a three-dimensional autologous costal cartilage framework for lobule-type microtia.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用自体肋软骨全耳郭再造矫正耳垂型小耳畸形。

definition: external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
the wing of the nose/ala nasi
